text: (Humne ussey kaha) “Aey dawood, humne tujhey zameen mein khalifa banaya hai, lihaza tu logon ke darmiyan haqq ke saath hukumat kar, aur khwaish e nafs ki pairwi na kar ke woh tujhey Allah ki raah se bhatka degi. Jo log Allah ki raah se bhatakte hain yaqeenan unke liye sakht saza hai ke woh yaum ul hisaab ko bhool gaye.”
